com.maxleap

类 MLPushBroadcastReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.maxleap.MLPushBroadcastReceiver

  • public class MLPushBroadcastReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    A BroadcastReceiver for handling marketing push.

    • 方法详细资料

      • tryToAcquireLock

        public static void tryToAcquireLock(Context context)
        Try to acquire wake lock.
        参数:
        context - the android context

      • tryToReleaseLock

        public static void tryToReleaseLock()
        Try to release the current wake lock.

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        Handle the Push message from the broadcast.
        指定者:
        onReceive 在类中 BroadcastReceiver
        参数:
        context - the android context
        intent - the received intent from the broadcast

      • startIntent

        protected void startIntent(Context context,
               Intent resultIntent)
        Overrides this if you want to add some flags to the intent.
        参数:
        context - the android context
        resultIntent - the to start to

      • getNotification

        protected Notification getNotification(Context context,
                           Intent intent)
        Construct a notification for showing the push message.

        Overrides this if you want to customize the notification style.
        参数:
        context - the android context
        intent - the received intent from the broadcast
        返回:
        the new created notification

      • getActivity

        protected Class<? extends Activity> getActivity(Intent intent)
        Overrides this if you want to customize the activity to start to. By default, the return value is null. If method getUri() return not null, the returned activity would be ignored.
        参数:
        intent - the received intent from broadcast
        返回:
        an activity

      • getUri

        protected Uri getUri(Intent intent)
        Overrides this if you want to customize the Uri. By default, SDK would try to parse the key named "uri" from the intent.
        参数:
        intent - the received intent from broadcast
        返回:
        the uri

      • getLargeIcon

        protected Bitmap getLargeIcon(Context context)
        Overrides this if you want to show a large icon on the notification. Default is null.
        参数:
        context - the android context
        返回:
        a bitmap of large icon

      • getSmallIconId

        protected int getSmallIconId(Context context)
        Overrides this if you want to customize a small icon on the notification. By default, if has defines a meta data called "as.leap.push.notification_icon" in the AndroidManifest.xml, the value would be show as the small icon id. Or SDK would try to get the small icon id from element.
        参数:
        context - the android context
        返回:
        the id of small icon
